recipe_name: Poached peaches in brandy butterscotch sauce
author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the oven to 250C/500F/Gas 9. Place the peaches, brandy, a splash of water and sugar in an oven-proof frying pan and place in the hot oven. Bake for ten minutes.  Remove from the oven and set the peaches aside leaving the syrup in the pan.  Place on a hob at a high heat and add the butter and cream and reduce for 1-2 minutes.  Pour the sauce over the peaches and serve.
ingredients: 2 peaches, skinned and halved,  100ml/3Â½fl oz brandy,  splash of water,  85g/3oz caster sugar,  1 tbsp butter,  splash cream
